output.sentences: An eagle soared over the expansive green fields.
The eagle soared lower to take in the beauty of the flowers blooming.
His wings flexed as they drifted him higher over the mountains.
Better than the view of the green landscape, colorful flowers, and even the mountaintops, was another view he enjoyed: her.
Suddenly, his eyes sharped towards a threat to her and he knew he needed to protect her and he became a predator and the snake his prey.
